basics.name: David C Reay
basics.label: Senior AWS Architect & DevSecOps Engineer
basics.summary: Strategic AWS Solutions Architect (Professional) and MBA Technology Management Graduate with 15+ years of experience in high-security infrastructure and automated systems engineering. Expert in bridging the gap between engineering and compliance (ISO27001/SOC2), with a proven track record of reducing operational costs by up to 80% through serverless refactoring and automated vulnerability remediation. Post-nominals: MBA, BSc. Security Clearance: BPSS (Active).

work.name: Tabled Technologies Limited
work.summary: Spearheaded the infrastructure remediation and security hardening required for ISO27001 Stage 1 and Stage 2 compliance. Collaborated with external auditors (Cognisys) to identify gaps and implemented automated monitoring, logging, and network isolation across production and staging AWS environments.
highlights: Successfully prepared infrastructure for ISO27001 Stage 2 audit by remediating Internal Audit gaps A.8.31 and A.8.32.
Reduced Secrets Manager costs by approximately 83% by architecting JSON-bundled secret storage.
Fully automated security agent deployment (Trend Micro) via GitLab CI/CD and AWS Systems Manager.
Achieved 100% visibility for critical database and load balancer metrics through Infrastructure-as-Code monitoring.
Infrastructure Modernization: Migrated legacy NGINX EC2 reverse proxies to AWS ALBs with automated SSL.
Network Security: Executed full VPC network segregation, migrating Elastic Beanstalk applications to private subnets.
Security Hardening: Implemented AWS GuardDuty, automated SSH lockdown scripts, and enforced CloudTrail log integrity.
Serverless Migration: Refactored tasks into serverless AWS Lambda functions with EventBridge triggers.

work.name: Giacom (Communications) Limited
work.summary: Responsible for designing and implementing data architecture solutions, building and maintaining data pipelines for a team delivering AWS-based data solutions.
highlights: Architected multi-account AWS Landing Zones and VPC segmentation using Terraform.
Developed automated CI/CD pipelines for data solutions using Glue and Lambda.
Mentored junior staff on DevSecOps best practices and AWS Well-Architected Framework.
Utilized Amazon Bedrock and Generative AI (Chat-GPT).

work.name: Mental Health Innovations UK
work.summary: Contract to develop an existing de-identification data pipeline with pyspark and NLP.
highlights: Developed an existing de-identification data pipeline with Pyspark and NLP.
Performance testing and enhancement with ARM64 AWS Graviton processors.
Implemented TDD with pytest, pylint, and OpenAI API.
Infrastructure as Code with CloudFormation and Dockerization with EMR Serverless.

highlights: Migrated rental car aggregation website into AWS using EC2, RDS, and ElastiCache.
Deployed Single Page Application (SPA) using CloudFront, Lambda@Edge, and S3.
Infrastructure as Code with Terraform.
PHP application configuration and deployment with GitLab, CodePipeline, and Docker.

highlights: Deployed Django applications in the Beijing AWS region for DNA sequencing pipelines.
Automated 24+ specialized bioinformatics tools (BLAST, SAMTools) via Ansible.
Developed custom AWS Data Lake using Postgres (RDS), Lambda, and Step Functions.
Jenkins pipeline development and IaC with CloudFormation.

highlights: Built AWS serverless infrastructure using Chalice, SAM, and API Gateway.
Integrated AppFlow and Salesforce for business process automation.
Python web development with Django and API development.
Data engineering with Glue, Athena, and Pandas (Parquet).

Serverless development (Lambda, Step Functions, DynamoDB, Cognito).
Python programming with Boto3, NumPy, and Pandas.

Python 3.8 programming with Boto3.
Building AWS serverless stacks (Lambda, Step Functions, API Gateway).

Created comprehensive guides to ensure successful long-term adoption of AI technologies.
